Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Bendine Way, west of the Blue Rose Meditation Chamber.
Room.LongDescription: The Blue Rose Meditation Chamber is a small study area for young clerics who need to meditate and/or pray to their dieties for whatever reason. The Meditation Chamber provides a quiet building for these clerics, monks or druids to relax in the peacefullness of meditation.
